content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had this conversation with a potential tenant named Farhad Abbasi from Iran.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of our conversation was negotiating the rental price of an apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: Did you agree on a final price?
name: Evaluator

content: Yes, we agreed on a price of €900 per month.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: If yes, what was the final price? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: The final agreed-upon price was €900 per month.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: On a scale from 1 to 10, with 1 being very unlikeable and 10 being very likeable, how would you rate the likeability of the negotiation partner? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: I would rate the likeability of the negotiation partner at 8. He was respectful, polite, and understanding.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: At any point of the negotiation did you feel discriminated or offended? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: If yes, why did you feel being discriminated or offended?
name: Evaluator

content: [Answer] I did not feel discriminated or offended at any point in the negotiation.
name: Peter Schmidt
